=================================================
 
 



Drama about a driver for a criminal gang. When Vince's alibi does not hold up, he has no choice but to follow through with the job, knowing it will change his life for ever.

1/3 Vince McKee's life is turned upside down when he agrees to drive for a criminal gang. to unlock the secrets of Angkor.

2/3 Ros suspects Vince is lying to her. Vince is left distraught when Tim refuses to see him.
 
3/3 When Vince's alibi does not hold up, he has no choice but to follow through with the job.
